fields.summary: Countdown Picker does not render on the iPad

fields.description:
Description:
When testing Controls>Picker>Countdown Picker, the picker did not render. The iPad 2 had slightly better results with a little bit of the picker rendered, and some black text was seen.


Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.7.0 on iPad 1
2) Navigate to Controls>Picker>Countdown Picker

Result:
Picker is not rendered correctly

Expected Result:
Beautiful picker displayed

Notes:
OCCURS on 1.6.2
OCCURS on iPad 2 (except no bar and black letter visible.
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink: Controls>Picker>Countdown Picker: Picker not rendered on iPad.
fields.environment: iPad 1 (3.2.2) , Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201105131803, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X r3ecace11

comments.body:
Bug behavior is now limited to iPad 4.3. Bug behavior has slightly improved since first logged. Now, the fields show, but the colors are not rendered properly. Screenshot attached.

SDK: 1.8.2, 2.0.0.v20120328183230
Studio: 2.0.0.201203291340
OS: Snow Leopard
Devices Tested: iPad/iPad Simulator 4.3
Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
